class ASemigroup s where
  • (.+.) :: s -> s -> s
name: ASemigroup .+.

display_html:
class ASemigroup m => AMonoid m where
  • zero :: m
name: AMonoid zero

display_html:
class MSemigroup r => MSemiSpace m r | m -> r where
  • (.*) :: m -> r -> m
name: MSemiSpace .*

display_html:
class (MGroup k, MSemiSpace v k) => MSpace v k | v -> k where
  • (.%) :: v -> k -> v
name: MSpace .%

name: Semimodule

display_html: class (MSpace v k, Semifield k, Semimodule v k) => SemivectorSpace v k | v -> k
name: SemivectorSpace

class Normed s where

class LowerBounded a where
